thread.title: Lucas Museum Goes to Los Angeles Instead of San Francisco
thread.title_full: Lucas Museum Goes to Los Angeles Instead of San Francisco

author: Cy Musiker
title: Lucas Museum Goes to Los Angeles Instead of San Francisco

locations.name: los angeles instead of san francisco decades

text:
Decades ago, George Lucas chose the Bay Area as the base for his film empire — but today, he chose Exposition Park in Los Angeles as the new home for his Museum of Narrative Art.
“We have been humbled by the overwhelmingly positive support we received from both San Francisco and Los Angeles,” said the Lucas Museum Board of Directors in a statement issued this afternoon.
“Settling on a location proved to be an extremely difficult decision precisely because of the desirability of both sites and cities.”
No comment yet from San Francisco Mayor Ed Lee, but just yesterday Lee tweeted a photo of himself and museum boosters on Treasure Island with a Yoda-esque quote worthy of a Jedi knight: “The wisest choice for the George Lucas Museum, San Francisco is.”

The museum board extended a special thanks to Lee and the San Francisco Board of Supervisors “for their tremendous efforts and engagement.”
